note.p: Birth: Alderley Rectory, Cheshire, England (13 December 1815)
Burial: Henry VII's Chapel, Westminster Abbey
Education: Rugby; Balliol College, Oxford. BA (1833), DD

Career: Fellow, University College, Oxford; took Holy Orders; travelled on the Continent (1840); Canon of Canterbury (1851); Regius Professor of Ecclesiatical History, University of Oxford (1856); accompanied Prince of Wales on his Eastern Tour (1862); Dean of Westminster (1864-1881); died of erysepelas
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1881-1882 vol 33 pp xx-xxii
